        public void Switch(
            global::System.Action<int> a1,
            global::System.Action<int?> a2)
        {
            Match(
                v => { a1(v); return global::System.ValueTuple.Create(); },
                v => { a2(v); return global::System.ValueTuple.Create(); });

            TState state,
            global::System.Action<TState, int> a1,
            global::System.Action<TState, int?> a2)

                state,
